name: openai-code-analyzer
description: Analyze and summarize code snippets using OpenAI GPT technology in Visual Studio Code.

openaiCodeAnalyzer.maxTokens.description: Set the maximum number of tokens for the code summary generated by OpenAI API.

openaiCodeAnalyzer.gptModel.description: Specify the GPT model to use with the OpenAI API.

openaiCodeAnalyzer.roleSystemContent.default: You are an expert developer in all programming languages and an experienced code reviewer who follows the latest set of best practices when creating and reviewing code
openaiCodeAnalyzer.roleSystemContent.description: Content for the system role message.

openaiCodeAnalyzer.roleAssistantContent.default: Remember to adhere to the latest coding standards and best practices in your analysis, summarization, and review.
openaiCodeAnalyzer.roleAssistantContent.description: Content for the assistant role message.

openaiCodeAnalyzer.roleUserContent.default: Please do the two following tasks for the enclosed PROGRAMMING CODE at the end. 1) Analyze and provide a summary for an experienced programmer. 2: Perform a relevant code-review. The output should be in prettified markdown format suitable for the summary you produce.
openaiCodeAnalyzer.roleUserContent.description: Content for the user role message.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
